scripts.dev: echo "To run locally with Vite and hot-reloading if vite.config.ts is set up for it: vite dev. Otherwise, serve dist folder after a build."
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.mjs --platform=browser --format=esm --jsx=automatic --define:process.env.API_KEY="'$GEMINI_API_KEY'" && cp index.html index.css metadata.json dist/
scripts.start: echo "No start script configured. Serve the 'dist' folder after running 'npm run build'."
